header.title: Open Huts
header.tagline: Revolutionary platform connecting nature enthusiasts with mountain huts worldwide, enabling sustainable outdoor tourism and comprehensive adventure planning

overview.title: Project vision
overview.p1: Open Huts Nature Network is a platform connecting outdoor enthusiasts with mountain accommodations worldwide. The project focuses on sustainable outdoor tourism and supporting local mountain communities.
overview.p2: The platform aims to address accessibility challenges in mountain tourism while promoting environmental conservation and community engagement.
